verses.roman:
śāstrera vicāra bhāla-manda nāhi jāni
sarasvatī ye balāya, sei bali vāṇī

synonyms: śāstrera vicāra—discussion of śāstra; bhāla-manda—good or bad; nāhi jāni—do not know; sarasvatī—mother Sarasvatī; ye balāya—whatever she speaks; sei—those; bali—I say; vāṇī—words.
translation: "My dear sir, I do not know what is good composition and what is bad. But whatever I have spoken must be understood to have been spoken by mother Sarasvatī."
